self.__next_f.push([1,"17:T476,Andy Rappaport is Managing Partner of Skyline Public Works, Chief Investment Officer of SPW Investments, and Treasurer of the Rappaport Family Foundation. He has spent more than 35 years founding, investing in, and guiding scores of transformative start-up companies. From 1996 until starting his retirement in 2012, Andy was an active partner at August Capital, a leading technology venture capital firm, which he helped grow from $100M to more than $2B under management. Prior to joining August, Andy ran The Technology Research Group, a Boston-based global strategy consulting firm he founded in 1984. Andy is a noted authority on the business and economic implications of changing technologies and has written and spoken extensively on the topic. Technology companies Andy co-founded, led investments in, and/or served as a board member of including Actel, Atheros Communications, Luxtera, MMC Networks, Silicon Architects, Olema Oncology, Silicon Image, and Transmeta. Andy and his wife Deborah are active philanthropists, focusing primarily on causes of equity and social justice. They are the founders of the Minnesota Street Project ("])

Optional private tenancy for sensitive workloads.\",\"title\":\"Secure by Default\",\"titleSize\":\"small\"},{\"_key\":\"360788062c72\",\"_type\":\"featuredNews\",\"layoutVariant\":\"50-50\",\"listStyle\":\"list\",\"newsItems\":[{\"_key\":\"bde8d1753683\",\"_ref\":\"2fda932a-9d1f-45d1-89f7-7d0f3a44e035\",\"_type\":\"reference\"},{\"_key\":\"669dc71b4014\",\"_ref\":\"1d42f4fe-7663-4c37-8ac5-8b368c4ed744\",\"_type\":\"reference\"},{\"_key\":\"ec8851126801\",\"_ref\":\"72c9cd02-01eb-4631-97d0-aa8815fb8c89\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}],\"title\":\"Featured\"},{\"_key\":\"838ba705fc58\",\"_ref\":\"b1453538-b080-4d55-a24f-057cf0b5bd70\",\"_type\":\"linkedSection\"}],\"slug\":{\"_type\":\"slug\",\"current\":\"groqcloud\"},\"title\":\"GroqCloud\"},\"label\":\"GroqCloud\",\"link\":{\"_type\":\"link\",\"internal\":{\"_ref\":\"6fa9e5b4-f5c2-4341-8664-9f15a8739ad9\",\"_type\":\"reference\"},\"label\":\"GroqCloud\",\"linkType\":\"internalFieldset\",\"newWindow\":false},\"title\":\"GroqCloud\",\"type\":\"page\",\"url\":\"groqcloud\"},{\"_key\":\"69a081ba006b\",\"_type\":\"navigationItem\",\"document\":{\"_createdAt\":\"2025-09-11T23:42:11Z\",\"_id\":\"0ad69a79-67fa-42c6-9578-db1f9f51af4b\",\"_rev\":\"VjPmycE5oKUI5IFLXHiN0s\",\"_system\":{\"base\":{\"id\":\"0ad69a79-67fa-42c6-9578-db1f9f51af4b\",\"rev\":\"VjPmycE5oKUI5IFLXHgxx8\"}},\"_type\":\"page\",\"_updatedAt\":\"2025-09-26T01:00:17Z\",\"objectSections\":[{\"_key\":\"d71200db0f5d\",\"_type\":\"feature\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"c852da57783a\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"71d535ecace6\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Compiler and software-defined, single-core architecture removes traditional software complexity while continuous, token-based execution delivers consistent performance without tradeoffs. Every cycle is accounted for. No wasted operations, no unpredictable delays.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"eyebrow\":\"Built for speed and precision\",\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-939c07ca64bf8e83920e93eb2eb205bc57a7c3cb-11648x8736-png\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"mediaSide\":\"left\",\"theme\":{\"label\":\"light-100\",\"value\":\"#FAFAF8\"},\"title\":\"Introducing the LPU\",\"titleSize\":\"medium\"},{\"_key\":\"19b121f00d99\",\"_type\":\"multicard\",\"cardIconLayoutVariant\":\"inline\",\"cardStyleVariant\":\"outline\",\"multicardItems\":[{\"_key\":\"0e1b149c054a\",\"_type\":\"card\",\"icon\":{\"_type\":\"iconPicker\",\"name\":\"HiChip\",\"provider\":\"hi\"},\"subhead\":\"The LPU integrates hundreds of MB of SRAM as primary weight storage (not cache), cutting latency and feeding compute units at full speed. This enables efficient tensor parallelism across chips, a practical advantage for fast, scalable inference.\",\"title\":\"Single Core \u0026 On-Chip SRAM \"},{\"_key\":\"6c09b8f86ef8\",\"_type\":\"card\",\"icon\":{\"_type\":\"iconPicker\",\"name\":\"HiClock\",\"provider\":\"hi\"},\"subhead\":\"Groq’s purpose-built compiler enables static scheduling and deterministic execution, ensuring predictable performance at every scale.\",\"title\":\"Custom Compiler, Fully In Control \"},{\"_key\":\"42ef7ab15a6e\",\"_type\":\"card\",\"icon\":{\"_type\":\"iconPicker\",\"name\":\"HiDatabase\",\"provider\":\"hi\"},\"subhead\":\"Air-cooled by design, Groq’s LPU and GroqRack require no complex cooling and power infrastructure, cutting operating costs and lowering environmental impact.\",\"title\":\"Power Efficient\"},{\"_key\":\"dbbea1ce9d19\",\"_type\":\"card\",\"icon\":{\"_type\":\"iconPicker\",\"name\":\"HiAnnotation\",\"provider\":\"hi\"},\"subhead\":\"LPUs connect directly via a plesiosynchronous protocol, aligning hundreds of chips to act as a single core. The compiler predicts data arrival precisely, coordinating both compute and network scheduling without reliance on caches or switches.\",\"title\":\"Direct Chip-to-Chip Edwards is the Chief Executive Officer of Groq. Edwards has extensive leadership experience guiding technology companies through periods of rapid growth and transformation. Prior to Groq, he served as CFO at Conga, overseeing finance, corporate development, and revenue operations. He previously served as CFO of ServiceMax, where he steered the company through profitability and expansion, culminating in its acquisition by PTC in 2023. Earlier in his career, Edwards held senior finance leadership roles at General Electric, including CFO of GE Digital. Edwards holds a BS from the University of the West of England and an MBA from the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Mohsen Moazami\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-e44a58daf722041011195f5c4cf78ba51ea61d13-1000x1000-png\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Chief Executive Officer\",\"title\":\"Simon Edwards\"},{\"_key\":\"3d5085b27c21\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"a8cbb55262fc\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"748fd6065bcf\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"Claire Hart is a strategic legal executive and business advisor with over 20 years experience steering innovative technology companies at various stages of growth through unchartered legal, business and cultural challenges and opportunities. She is adept at tackling novel legal challenges and forging strategic partnerships in new technologies and evolving markets as well as guiding companies through high stakes situations. Claire has previously led legal teams at Google, was the Chief Legal Officer at Blizzard Entertainment, and most recently built out the legal, people and business affairs functions at Genies, an avatar technology startup. Outside of her day job, Claire is a frequent speaker, teacher and mentor, particularly focused on creating opportunities for early career legal professionals.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Claire Hart\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-e6859e4208255b06cdf390b39452c15ece5001af-1000x1000-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Chief Operating Officer\",\"title\":\"Claire Hart\"},{\"_key\":\"c1e94c8b6570\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"dd630f93db34\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"5210594e95e7\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"Allison Hopkins has 35 years of experience as an HR business leader, advisor and investor working with start-ups, pre-IPO and Fortune 500 companies. Her choices have mostly led her to companies that were attempting to change an industry and/or in hyper-growth mode.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"b559648b51c8\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"9cc247bd682d\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"The most notable organizations she was a part of are E*Trade, Netflix, Palo Alto Networks and thredUP. She was also part of the team that took thredUP public.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"295ce2121761\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"913cc89cc528\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"Prior to thredUP she was the SVP of HR at Palo Alto Networks and also assisted in taking them public. She served as Vice President of Talent at Netflix, and Head of Human Resources at E*TRADE. During her tenure all three companies experienced hyper global growth (Ranging from 180-10,000 people, $250M-$7B in revenue). She was also the Founder and CEO of Core Elements, Inc., which provided human resources and internal communication consulting to global tech companies. Core Elements was nominated 6 years in a row as one of the fastest growing privately held companies in Silicon Valley.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"214eacb27b6d\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"3721bb0a2f36\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"She was nominated \u0026 elected to Leadership California and was awarded the YWCA’s prestigious Manager of the Year award. Good macros.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"26ef1e9268c2\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"8e1e93737691\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Morning: \"},{\"_key\":\"a56ecd36b619\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Catch up with the team and talk through high-level goals. A lot of this time goes into planning and shaping the AI infrastructure for the hardware org, thinking through what different teams like logical design, physical design, and verification need, and how AI can make their workflows more efficient.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"7ae8f12dac30\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"9a5786dccf2c\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Midday: \"},{\"_key\":\"11a0a98d1411\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Quick ping pong game to reset before lunch.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"8892733c73ca\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"ea560ffe4e33\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Lunch: \"},{\"_key\":\"8329b3027301\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Grab lunch, sometimes provided in the office, and get a grapefruit San Pellegrino. Dessert is half a glass of Starbucks Frappuccino from the fridge.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"36dfd44ded57\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"be67d429d0bd\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Afternoon: \"},{\"_key\":\"5a04b91b389d\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Focus on coding and iterating on the AI infra, integrating with different teams’ flows, and testing new ideas.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"dd92193b92b8\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"747ebba4b9ae\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Evening: \"},{\"_key\":\"263688e3d947\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Another round of doubles ping pong (still undefeated), then tying up loose ends before calling it a day\"},{\"_key\":\"86c8e1010059\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\".\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"title\":\"Software Infrastructure Engineer Intern for Hardware Design\"},{\"_key\":\"c7ffb4ac8db88d5dcc51ae79771a12ff\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"40f31c4b2a39\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"40d68fe6be11\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"8:30 AM: \"},{\"_key\":\"067f30670006\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Arrive at Groq’s Hardware Lab in San Jose. Start the day with a hardware-wide standup to align on priorities and hear progress updates from other teams.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"b8cf245d2368\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"617557b38b7d\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"8:45 AM: \"},{\"_key\":\"7b247eb02489\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Meet with coworkers and check Slack for ongoing work or open threads. Most mornings involve bringing up new boards, debugging hardware setups, and prepping the bench for the day’s experiments.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"b12ef76cd68f\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"a94b38c913ea\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"9:00 AM: \"},{\"_key\":\"56748d3b93df\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Place a lunch order through Groq-partnered food-delivery app, then dive into the first work block of the day.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"382544c4403e\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"6cacf341bc0a\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"12:30 PM: \"},{\"_key\":\"a038f43d520d\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Lunch in the office with other interns and engineers. Occasionally, we’ll have lunches with external vendors or lunch-and-learn sessions focused on new hardware tools or design workflows.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"17877df2c515\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"e0cb6bf7ee84\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"1:00 PM: \"},{\"_key\":\"3e84f93e4707\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Continue into the next work block. Afternoons usually focus on power characterization and collaborating across teams (one of the best parts of being at Groq is the range of projects you get to touch)!\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"5f91fd37f496\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"8a1b757ebd56\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"3:30 PM: \"},{\"_key\":\"6722569b8776\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Meet with teams across silicon, firmware, and systems teams to review data and discuss next steps. Some days include vendor meetings on VRM tuning or component debugging.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"200e33bb7a96\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"57c65530eead\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"5:30 PM: \"},{\"_key\":\"fde8c59ec6dd\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Sync with my manager to go over the day’s findings and results. I’ll often stay longer to wrap up work, tidy documentation, or push a few more changes before heading out.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"8eabed281ef1\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"0fb3050e8aea\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Optional - Post-6:00 PM: \"},{\"_key\":\"585ef75fb81c\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"On days when there’s a big push or the team’s wrapping up something exciting, a few will stick around late to finish strong and grab dinner nearby.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"title\":\"Hardware Engineering Intern\"}],\"layoutVariant\":\"full\",\"theme\":{\"label\":\"light-200\",\"value\":\"#F3F3EE\"},\"title\":\"Intern Day in the Life\"},{\"_key\":\"8b289ad3579a\",\"_type\":\"featuredNews\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"c62a3e3332ed\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"a4df5a2509d0\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Build fast. This may include providers of services such as infrastructure, hosting, data analysis, order fulfillment, payment processing, IT services, customer support and services, professional services, audit services, or advertising and marketing services, among others.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"767327f88faf\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"78567069118a\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Your organization.\"},{\"_key\":\"5003da2a9ebc\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\" If you are using the Services on behalf of an organization’s customer account, your organization may have access to information generated as you use the Cloud Services. Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the ability to appeal our decision. In such circumstances, we will inform you of your appeal rights and how to exercise it in our response to your request.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"f8bf2ef8781b\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"32f71bea4ff0\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"We will not discriminate against you for exercising your rights. This means that we will not penalize you for exercising your rights by taking actions such as denying you services; increasing the price/rate of services; decreasing service quality; or suggesting that we may penalize you as described above for exercising your rights.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"15b4c0ad86cf\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"01bed3ae62b8\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority or regulator in your jurisdiction of residence.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"e6df5707fc2c\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"93b7e987c2ca\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"If you are located in California, and want more detailed information about the categories of information we collect, sources of information, and our disclosures of information, please see the chart in the “\"},{\"_key\":\"98a09c08c27e\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Additional Information for California Residents\"},{\"_key\":\"aaff665fc2ab\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"” section below.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"0e005feefe2d\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"af9e1eb5277d\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Your Marketing Choices\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"49a1a992d1fc\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"6a9abedec1fd\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"In accordance with applicable law, we may send you promotional offers, updates, newsletters, and other marketing communications. You may also contact us at the contact information provided below and request that we no longer use your information to send marketing communications. When determining the appropriate retention period for the information we process and store, we take into account various criteria, such as the type of Services requested by or provided to you, the nature and length of our relationship with you, the impact on the Services we provide to you, and legally-required retention periods.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"89962316a213\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"8c7628d110c0\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Notification of Policy Changes\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"h2\"},{\"_key\":\"eb476bee1f84\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"008e98513de2\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"We may change this Policy from time to time. If we make material changes, we will provide you with additional notice (such as by adding a statement to the Services or sending you a notification). We encourage you to periodically review this page for the latest information on our privacy practices.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"06e8c5d2098b\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"14292e4125d2\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Children’s Privacy\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"h2\"},{\"_key\":\"6b5101db672e\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"7ebba4aeaaa2\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Our Services are not directed to children, and we do not knowingly collect identifiable information from children under the age of 18. If you learn that a child has provided us with identifiable information in violation of this Policy, please contact us as indicated at the end of this Policy.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"21a63b91c59c\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"8106438dba32\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Third Party Links and Features\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"h2\"},{\"_key\":\"948266701580\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"82c4398809b7\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Our Services may contain features or links to websites and services provided by third parties. Any information you provide on third-party websites or services is provided directly to the operators of such websites or services and is subject to those operators’ policies governing privacy and security, even if accessed via our Services. We are not responsible for the privacy and security practices of third parties to which links or access are provided through our Services. We encourage you to learn about third parties’ privacy and security policies before using their services or providing them with your information.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"a7caceae70f6\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"07a482dade98\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Additional Information for International Users\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"h2\"},{\"_key\":\"bc170261a13f\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"dfc77af475bf\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Groq is located in the United States, and maintains processing operations in various global jurisdictions. We may therefore transfer your information to countries other than the country where you are located, including to the U.S. or any other country in which we or our service providers maintain facilities. Whenever we make restricted international transfers of personal information, we take steps to ensure that your personal information receives an adequate level of protection (such as by using approved contractual protections for the transfer of information or relying on third parties’ Data Privacy Framework certifications, where applicable). Where relevant, you may request access to the safeguards we use to transfer your personal information outside of the European Economic Area, United Kingdom, Switzerland, or the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"3646ede81bf4\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"3bc78150bc6f\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Additional Information for California Residents\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"h2\"},{\"_key\":\"1ba81739564c\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"6fd5476d9824\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"If you are a California resident, the California Consumer Privacy Act (“\"},{\"_key\":\"3ac6b2f05e75\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"CCPA\"},{\"_key\":\"cfd6c8a58ac6\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"”) requires us to provide you with certain additional information about our privacy practices.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"1b4096e71c19\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"3c107d1773bb\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Under the CCPA, “\"},{\"_key\":\"3a8ad6ba5aea\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"sharing\"},{\"_key\":\"8341a7a4f18a\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"” is defined as the targeting of advertising to a consumer based on that consumer’s personal information obtained from the consumer’s activity across distinct online services, and “\"},{\"_key\":\"d1bf14a28e99\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"selling\"},{\"_key\":\"f561d06f5aac\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"” is defined as the disclosure of personal information to third parties in exchange for monetary or other valuable consideration. Our use of third-party analytics services may result in the sharing of online identifiers (e.g., cookie data, IP addresses, device identifiers, and usage information) in a way that may be considered a “\"},{\"_key\":\"6ae1df19e876\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"sale\"},{\"_key\":\"65465c0ed290\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"” under the CCPA. We also disclose certain categories of personal data to show you targeted ads on third party properties and to expand the reach and effectiveness of our own marketing campaigns.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"7aeb7a34a07f\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"3c551e97bb60\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Our Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. We may ask authorized agents to submit proof of their authority to make a request, such as a valid power of attorney or proof that they have signed permission from the consumer who is the subject of the request. In some cases, we may contact the individual who is the subject of the request to verify their own identity or confirm the authorized agent has permission to submit the request.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"b6063c3ce3ec\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"0102a682bba7\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"If we deny your request, you may contact us to appeal our decision. If you have concerns about the result of an appeal, you may contact the California Attorney General.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"6eb4d602caa9\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"7f1422a93772\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"To exercise these rights, submit a request as an authorized agent, or to appeal the denial of a rights request, please contact us using the contact information below.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"430bf52ae677\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"b56591bcbce8\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"You have the right not to be discriminated against for exercising any of your privacy rights.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"cca6561a0cf8\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"682774ed5101\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Your Choices Regarding “Sharing” and “Selling”\"},{\"_key\":\"3ced27b4bd6c\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\". You can opt-out of sharing your personal data for targeted advertising to promote our products and services by clicking the “Your Privacy Choices” link in the footer below, and we will honor global privacy controls.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"ac26bea82d8a\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"deea0443573d\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Financial Incentives\"},{\"_key\":\"fb6e4b167aae\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\". Cookies can help services remember information about your visit, such as your language settings or when you logged in, which can improve your experience when you revisit a website. They can also be used for other purposes, such as helping online services troubleshoot errors, better understanding how their services are being used, and supporting their marketing and targeted advertising efforts. Cookies set by Groq are called first-party cookies. We also use third-party cookies, which are cookies from a domain different from the domain of the website you are visiting. Similar technologies, such as pixels, web beacons, or local storage, can also be used for these purposes. We use “cookies” to refer to cookies and similar technologies.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"64cd30c8369c\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"07cec21b143e\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Necessary Cookies\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"h2\"},{\"_key\":\"2b570c13ade2\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"378c9d396c80\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"These cookies are required to operate our Services. By optimizing compute density, memory bandwidth, and scalability, LPUs overcome this bottleneck and deliver ultra-low latency inference, unlocking a new class of use cases.\",\"theme\":\"silver\",\"title\":\"Groq Advantages\"},{\"_key\":\"004c7fbb03e0\",\"_type\":\"feature\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"ba778ffda65e\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"638bf28c7080\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"GPUs are ideal for training models, but not inference, making launching and scaling many AI applications economically infeasible. Groq offers a win-win solution: record-breaking speed at competitive rates. Additionally, the Groq architecture requires no external switches, meaning CAPEX for on-prem deployments Groq is spent on compute, not network infrastructure. \"},{\"_key\":\"3f4a20702ef8\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"a72a19dade55\"],\"text\":\"Source: McKinsey.\"}],\"markDefs\":[{\"_key\":\"a72a19dade55\",\"_type\":\"link\",\"newWindow\":true,\"url\":\"https://www.mckinsey.com/capabilities/mckinsey-digital/our-insights/the-economic-potential-of-generative-ai-the-next-productivity-frontier\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-750729b3632ffd8f6ea3c8c046c887f2e9607a24-880x450-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"mediaSide\":\"right\",\"title\":\"Affordability\",\"titleColor\":\"default\",\"titleSize\":\"regular\"},{\"_key\":\"d68218258ab4\",\"_type\":\"feature\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"24bd6203a256\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"695023747716\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"At an architectural level, the LPU is up to 10X more energy efficient than other systems. Edwards has extensive leadership experience guiding technology companies through periods of rapid growth and transformation. Prior to Groq, he served as CFO at Conga, overseeing finance, corporate development, and revenue operations. He previously served as CFO of ServiceMax, where he steered the company through profitability and expansion, culminating in its acquisition by PTC in 2023. Earlier in his career, Edwards held senior finance leadership roles at General Electric, including CFO of GE Digital. Edwards holds a BS from the University of the West of England and an MBA from the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Mohsen Moazami\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-e44a58daf722041011195f5c4cf78ba51ea61d13-1000x1000-png\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Chief Executive Officer\",\"title\":\"Simon Edwards\"},{\"_key\":\"3d5085b27c21\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"a8cbb55262fc\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"748fd6065bcf\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"Claire Hart is a strategic legal executive and business advisor with over 20 years experience steering innovative technology companies at various stages of growth through unchartered legal, business and cultural challenges and opportunities. She is adept at tackling novel legal challenges and forging strategic partnerships in new technologies and evolving markets as well as guiding companies through high stakes situations. Claire has previously led legal teams at Google, was the Chief Legal Officer at Blizzard Entertainment, and most recently built out the legal, people and business affairs functions at Genies, an avatar technology startup. Outside of her day job, Claire is a frequent speaker, teacher and mentor, particularly focused on creating opportunities for early career legal professionals.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Claire Hart\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-e6859e4208255b06cdf390b39452c15ece5001af-1000x1000-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Chief Operating Officer\",\"title\":\"Claire Hart\"},{\"_key\":\"c1e94c8b6570\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"dd630f93db34\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"5210594e95e7\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"Allison Hopkins has 35 years of experience as an HR business leader, advisor and investor working with start-ups, pre-IPO and Fortune 500 companies. Her choices have mostly led her to companies that were attempting to change an industry and/or in hyper-growth mode.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"b559648b51c8\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"9cc247bd682d\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"The most notable organizations she was a part of are E*Trade, Netflix, Palo Alto Networks and thredUP. While being the Chief People Officer at thredUP she was also the COO for 2 years and led operations which included HR, distribution centers, customer service, logistics \u0026amp; industrial engineering. She was also part of the team that took thredUP public.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"295ce2121761\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"913cc89cc528\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"Prior to thredUP she was the SVP of HR at Palo Alto Networks and also assisted in taking them public. She served as Vice President of Talent at Netflix, and Head of Human Resources at E*TRADE. During her tenure all three companies experienced hyper global growth (Ranging from 180-10,000 people, $250M-$7B in revenue). She was also the Founder and CEO of Core Elements, Inc., which provided human resources and internal communication consulting to global tech companies. Core Elements was nominated 6 years in a row as one of the fastest growing privately held companies in Silicon Valley.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"214eacb27b6d\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"3721bb0a2f36\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"She was nominated \u0026 elected to Leadership California and was awarded the YWCA’s prestigious Manager of the Year award. Groq is the innovator of the novel LPU compute architecture, accelerating workloads in AI, ML, and HPC through their product portfolio ranging from GroqCard™ to GroqRack™. Prior to founding Groq, Jonathan began what became Google’s Tensor Processing Unit (TPU) as a 20% project where he designed and implemented the core elements of the first generation TPU chip. Jonathan next joined Google X’s Rapid Eval Team, the initial stage of the famed “Moonshots factory”, where he devised and incubated new Bets (Units) for Google’s parent company, Alphabet. Jonathan studied under Yann LeCun of the New York University Courant Institute.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Jonathan Ross\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-2a525e066a9c8b0fd7d975e4b2aa74e88b837b6d-1000x1000-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"CEO \u0026 Founder\",\"title\":\"Jonathan Ross\"},{\"_key\":\"9e764c830d6c\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"08bc453888e1\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"ebdbc995e970\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Claire Hart is a strategic legal executive and business advisor with over 20 years experience steering innovative technology companies at various stages of growth through unchartered legal, business and cultural challenges and opportunities. Mr. Moazami is senior advisor to Blackstone and Siguler Guff ($20 Bil AUM), Further, Mr. Moazami is an operating partner at Kestrel Partners in London.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"9567ea121d49\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"50962c154df8\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Until recently he served as the Chairman of Astrea Acquisition Corp (NASDAQ: ASAX). He serves as a board member or a Sr. advisor to many VC-backed startups in Silicon Valley such as X-Energy, Axiom Space, Vcinity, Edgecloud Link (ECL), Ethernovia (AMD and Marvell-backed) and several others.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"347bd480b412\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"5da7ab24c559\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Mr. Moazami’s previous roles include founder and CEO of Stanford Business Systems (SBS – acquired by Accenture), 12 years at Cisco, the last four of which were in the leadership of their Emerging Markets division. He then co-founded CNTP, a global, multi-stage, technology investment firm with $300 mil AUM, investing in security, cyber security, big data analytics, gig economy and SaaS applications. A sample of his early-stage investments are Matterport (IPO), DoorDash (IPO), Bina Technologies (acquired by Roche), and Bracket Computing (acquired by vMware). Mr. Moazami also served on the Board of a telecommunications company, Global Capacity, where he helped oversee a turnaround of the business leading to a $150m acquisition by GTT.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Mohsen Moazami\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-0bae1452c9179a5936e025347e5994c45ef21a71-400x400-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"President of International, Groq\",\"title\":\"Mohsen Moazami\"},{\"_key\":\"51f053bd6098\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"f06e69a00689\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"956d34d272db\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Simon Edwards is the Chief Financial Officer of Groq. Edwards has extensive leadership experience guiding technology companies through periods of rapid growth and transformation. Prior to Groq, he served as CFO at Conga, overseeing finance, corporate development, and revenue operations. He previously served as CFO of ServiceMax, where he steered the company through profitability and expansion, culminating in its acquisition by PTC in 2023. Edwards holds a BS from the University of the West of England and an MBA from the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-e44a58daf722041011195f5c4cf78ba51ea61d13-1000x1000-png\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Chief Financial Officer\",\"title\":\"Simon Edwards\"},{\"_key\":\"c324aba2ba7e\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"fbea54b5f7f2\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"115080fc125f\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Ian Andrews is the Chief Revenue Officer at Groq. Previously as CMO of Chainalysis, he built a global team achieving 4x growth in customers and revenue. At Pivotal Software, Ian served as SVP of Products \u0026 Marketing, leading the company from launch through IPO to the $2.7B acquisition by VMware. His earlier roles at Opsware and Aster Data established his track record of scaling innovative technology companies. With expertise spanning both sales and marketing, Ian specializes in bringing transformative products to market and building high-performing teams across AI infrastructure, blockchain analytics, and enterprise software.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Ian Andrews\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-2b35f11dca4ed1f787156c9755fbe89c13d73275-1000x1000-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Chief Revenue Officer\",\"title\":\"Ian Andrews\"},{\"_key\":\"42542eab2c98\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"07df55222767\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"d56002cece13\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Chelsey Susin Kantor brings deep expertise in AI and technology marketing. With a background in math and computer science, she has spent her career turning complex innovations into compelling brand narratives. At Google, she focused on brand relevance and shaping the early cultural narrative around AI. At Meta, she led global marketing for VR, guiding the brand through major milestones, including its transition to Meta. Most recently, she co-founded \"},{\"_key\":\"2f6a1f43a52a\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"45ca985dc13c\"],\"text\":\"brand.ai\"},{\"_key\":\"55873cdf10e3\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\", an AI company focused on brand, creativity, and business impact. Now, as CMO of Groq, she is driving the next era of AI compute, bringing clarity and momentum to a company poised to reshape the industry.\"}],\"markDefs\":[{\"_key\":\"45ca985dc13c\",\"_type\":\"link\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Chelsey Susin Kantor\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-4caaa4203de58941becd561644934ddfaa136b6d-1000x1000-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Chief Marketing Officer\",\"title\":\"Chelsey Susin Kantor\"},{\"_key\":\"f4fd24515d30\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"a04a8880b7a0\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"bd7d4273439a\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Igor is the Chief Architect \u0026 Head of Hardware at Groq. Previously at Google, Igor was responsible for SoC technology strategy for Google Cloud, leading the custom physical design effort for the TPU. Prior to Google, Igor was CTO of the IBM/GF/Marvell ASIC Business Unit, responsible for setting ASIC strategy for a 900+ person team, and personally optimizing 500+ of today’s best known enterprise networking and AI ASICs.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"909eb00b6aee\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"afc9abd7fbd5\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"\\nIgor is an IBM Master Inventor with over 100 patents, 30 IEEE papers and presentations at premier system (AI HW Summit, Linley Conference, ML and AI Dev Com) and circuit (ISSCC, VLSI, CICC, ECTC) conferences, and currently serves on the VLSI Technology Program Committee.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-0188d5192a67510cb36c2d413f6ab54ef9a1a8bf-1000x1000-png\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Chief Architect \u0026 Head of Hardware\",\"title\":\"Igor Arsovski\"},{\"_key\":\"d630a129c123\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"e572cb6a2bf7\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"b86f599aef47\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Andrew Ling is the Canada Country Manager and Head of ML Compilers at Groq. He spent over a decade in the semiconductor industry at Intel and Qualcomm building compilers, and now leads Groq compiler effort for the LPU. Ling received his PhD from the University of Toronto.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-8983eaca3f0163ac87bcff9991f48b43db040211-1000x1000-png\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Head of ML Compilers\",\"title\":\"Andrew Ling\"}],\"layoutVariant\":\"full\",\"sectionId\":\"leadership-team\",\"title\":\"Leadership Team\"},{\"_key\":\"110302c1f862\",\"_type\":\"accordion\",\"items\":[{\"_key\":\"5a887148b1db\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"3d056b921b7e\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"3e8d38cc7a9f\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Jonathan Ross is the CEO and founder of Groq. Groq is the innovator of the novel Tensor Streaming Processor compute architecture, accelerating workloads in AI, ML, and HPC through their product portfolio ranging from GroqCard™ to GroqRack™. Prior to founding Groq, Jonathan began what became Google’s Tensor Processing Unit (TPU) as a 20% project where he designed and implemented the core elements of the first generation TPU chip. Jonathan next joined Google X’s Rapid Eval Team, the initial stage of the famed “Moonshots factory”, where he devised and incubated new Bets (Units) for Google’s parent company, Alphabet. Jonathan studied under Yann LeCun of the New York University Courant Institute.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Jonathan Ross\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-2a525e066a9c8b0fd7d975e4b2aa74e88b837b6d-1000x1000-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"CEO, Founder, \u0026 Board Member\",\"title\":\"Jonathan Ross\"},{\"_key\":\"f18dac1fc614\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"f5712b09b46d\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"9ea52ffef592\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Youngme Moon is the Donald K. Douglas Professor of Business at Harvard Business School, where her research sits at the intersection of strategy, innovation, and marketing. A renowned branding and marketing strategist, she is the author of the bestselling book, Different, and has sold more than two million case studies on companies sprawling the digital economy. She has spent more than a decade advising, investing in, and guiding fledgling companies with disruptive potential. She currently serves on the Board of Directors of Mastercard, Unilever, Warby Parker, Sweetgreen, Shoop, Basic.Space, and others. She received her M.A. and Ph.D. from Stanford University, and her B.A. from Yale. Prior to joining HBS, she was on the faculty of MIT.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Youngme Moon\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-cc92acb346cd11aa35c23a755340e0765c90f554-1000x1000-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Board Member\",\"title\":\"Youngme Moon\"},{\"_key\":\"f4c358c2dbcd\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"2bb4230101f6\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"5b9fc6794cf4\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"$17\"},{\"_key\":\"7e1faa1e68ba\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"7713b14b4941\"],\"text\":\"www.minnesotastreetproject.com\"},{\"_key\":\"d34173228491\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"), a 120,000 square foot multi-building arts campus in San Francisco founded to provide an affordable, vibrant hub for the visual arts in an otherwise unaffordable city. Andy is also an active musician, and video and sound artist. He and Deborah split their time between San Francisco and Martha’s Vineyard.\"}],\"markDefs\":[{\"_key\":\"7713b14b4941\",\"_type\":\"link\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Andy Rappaport\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-7fa4303093a958c2d5aa1489ccaddba03c8b6d4b-1000x1000-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Board Member\",\"title\":\"Andy Rappaport\"},{\"_key\":\"92e4683bde4c\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"af52973a5c64\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"9253f910ac18\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Samir Menon, Managing Director, is a member of the BlackRock Private Equity Partners (PEP) group within BlackRock Alternative Investors. He is responsible for evaluating and executing on private equity direct and primary fund investments.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"cdbbf6a18f55\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"4a2a3b6383f2\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Mr. Menon was previously a Vice President at Firelight Capital Partners, where he was responsible for sourcing, evaluating, and executing buyout and growth equity investments in consumer \u0026 retail companies. Prior to business school, Mr. Menon was an investment professional at BlackRock Private Equity Partners in London and Princeton. He began his career with PEP in 2006. Mr. Menon currently serves on the Board of Directors of Cofense, Qumulo, PLNTF Holdings, and Vesta and is an observer to the Board of Directors of Flexe and Venture Metals.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"1083d219f091\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"c50042214615\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Mr. Menon earned a B.A. degree in Economics from Emory University and an M.B.A. from Columbia Business School.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Samir Menon\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-51a988318abe8d6d29080638a3bb5d579d5a30b5-1000x1000-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Board Member\",\"title\":\"Samir Menon\"},{\"_key\":\"9bf11c1aecbe\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"8cf364128177\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"ac6a265b604d\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Steven Trieu is a General Partner and Group CFO for Social Capital. He is responsible for overseeing its venture funds, proprietary investments, and wholly owned subsidiaries. He has been involved with technology companies for over 20 years, both as an operator and an investor.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"5e8ae262bd46\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"1c64946700fd\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"\\nMr. Trieu was previously Vice President of Finance at Quora, Inc., where he was responsible for all general and administrative functions, including finance, legal, facilities, and IT, and helped the company raise its Series B and Series C financings. Before joining Quora, Mr. Trieu served as Director of Finance at Facebook, where he built and led the company's initial Business Operations and Sales Finance functions. His team supported 50 times organic revenue growth and the expansion of its sales channels. Mr. Trieu started his technology career at Yahoo!, where he held several business operations roles across its Search and Marketplace properties. Before entering the technology industry, Mr. Trieu was an Associate at a fixed income derivatives hedge fund and an Investment Banking Associate at Banc of America Associates, now Merrill Lynch.\\n\\nMr. Trieu earned a B.A. degree in Economics and a B.B.A. degree in Finance from The University of Massachusetts Amherst.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-63a4df4f8119287b2fbde9e508e32fdf5268e672-1000x1000-png\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Board Member\",\"title\":\"Steve Trieu\"}],\"layoutVariant\":\"full\",\"sectionId\":\"board-of-directors\",\"title\":\"Board of Directors\"},{\"_key\":\"780f5223c664\",\"_ref\":\"18f6728e-bd86-4050-9f9b-038670d590bd\",\"_type\":\"linkedSection\"}],\"slug\":{\"_type\":\"slug\",\"current\":\"team\"},\"title\":\"Leadership\"},\"label\":\"Team\",\"linkText\":null,\"title\":\"Leadership\",\"type\":\"page\",\"url\":\"team\"},{\"document\":{\"_createdAt\":\"2025-05-19T14:48:06Z\",\"_id\":\"afedc5c2-3d1b-4531-bdb3-ecab12158cc3\",\"_rev\":\"p5nSRBft0Fa6JmWKDH6HQb\",\"_system\":{\"base\":{\"id\":\"afedc5c2-3d1b-4531-bdb3-ecab12158cc3\",\"rev\":\"O7zYC806gBBYNWamxrJcLB\"}},\"_type\":\"page\",\"_updatedAt\":\"2025-07-15T23:49:40Z\",\"objectSections\":[{\"_key\":\"57d3f682d8ac\",\"_type\":\"hero\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"d9c92c160c1a\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"6cf88b79bd81\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"We’re assembling a team of world-class engineers and business minds who believe in this mission. Edwards has extensive leadership experience guiding technology companies through periods of rapid growth and transformation. Prior to Groq, he served as CFO at Conga, overseeing finance, corporate development, and revenue operations. He previously served as CFO of ServiceMax, where he steered the company through profitability and expansion, culminating in its acquisition by PTC in 2023. Earlier in his career, Edwards held senior finance leadership roles at General Electric, including CFO of GE Digital. Edwards holds a BS from the University of the West of England and an MBA from the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania.\"}],\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Mohsen Moazami\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-e44a58daf722041011195f5c4cf78ba51ea61d13-1000x1000-png\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Chief Executive Officer\",\"title\":\"Simon Edwards\"},{\"_key\":\"3d5085b27c21\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"a8cbb55262fc\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"748fd6065bcf\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"Claire Hart is a strategic legal executive and business advisor with over 20 years experience steering innovative technology companies at various stages of growth through unchartered legal, business and cultural challenges and opportunities. She is adept at tackling novel legal challenges and forging strategic partnerships in new technologies and evolving markets as well as guiding companies through high stakes situations. Claire has previously led legal teams at Google, was the Chief Legal Officer at Blizzard Entertainment, and most recently built out the legal, people and business affairs functions at Genies, an avatar technology startup. Outside of her day job, Claire is a frequent speaker, teacher and mentor, particularly focused on creating opportunities for early career legal professionals.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Claire Hart\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-e6859e4208255b06cdf390b39452c15ece5001af-1000x1000-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Chief Operating Officer\",\"title\":\"Claire Hart\"},{\"_key\":\"c1e94c8b6570\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"dd630f93db34\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"5210594e95e7\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"Allison Hopkins has 35 years of experience as an HR business leader, advisor and investor working with start-ups, pre-IPO and Fortune 500 companies. Her choices have mostly led her to companies that were attempting to change an industry and/or in hyper-growth mode.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"b559648b51c8\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"9cc247bd682d\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"The most notable organizations she was a part of are E*Trade, Netflix, Palo Alto Networks and thredUP. While being the Chief People Officer at thredUP she was also the COO for 2 years and led operations which included HR, distribution centers, customer service, logistics \u0026amp; industrial engineering. She was also part of the team that took thredUP public.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"295ce2121761\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"913cc89cc528\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"Prior to thredUP she was the SVP of HR at Palo Alto Networks and also assisted in taking them public. She served as Vice President of Talent at Netflix, and Head of Human Resources at E*TRADE. During her tenure all three companies experienced hyper global growth (Ranging from 180-10,000 people, $250M-$7B in revenue). She was also the Founder and CEO of Core Elements, Inc., which provided human resources and internal communication consulting to global tech companies. Core Elements was nominated 6 years in a row as one of the fastest growing privately held companies in Silicon Valley.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"214eacb27b6d\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"3721bb0a2f36\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"text\":\"She was nominated \u0026 elected to Leadership California and was awarded the YWCA’s prestigious Manager of the Year award. She has had numerous published articles and speaking engagements on the impact of human resources, communication and culture in business.\"}],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"media\":{\"_type\":\"image\",\"altText\":\"Headshot of Allison Hopkins\",\"asset\":{\"_ref\":\"image-765b64d23bfc9400982f207510edbb557c852bb1-1000x1000-webp\",\"_type\":\"reference\"}},\"subhead\":\"Chief Talent Officer\",\"title\":\"Allison Dessert is half a glass of Starbucks Frappuccino from the fridge.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"36dfd44ded57\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"be67d429d0bd\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Afternoon: \"},{\"_key\":\"5a04b91b389d\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Focus on coding and iterating on the AI infra, integrating with different teams’ flows, and testing new ideas.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"dd92193b92b8\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"747ebba4b9ae\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Evening: \"},{\"_key\":\"263688e3d947\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Another round of doubles ping pong (still undefeated), then tying up loose ends before calling it a day\"},{\"_key\":\"86c8e1010059\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\".\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"title\":\"Software Infrastructure Engineer Intern for Hardware Design\"},{\"_key\":\"c7ffb4ac8db88d5dcc51ae79771a12ff\",\"_type\":\"accordionItem\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"40f31c4b2a39\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"40d68fe6be11\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"8:30 AM: \"},{\"_key\":\"067f30670006\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Arrive at Groq’s Hardware Lab in San Jose. Start the day with a hardware-wide standup to align on priorities and hear progress updates from other teams.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"b8cf245d2368\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"617557b38b7d\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"8:45 AM: \"},{\"_key\":\"7b247eb02489\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Meet with coworkers and check Slack for ongoing work or open threads. Most mornings involve bringing up new boards, debugging hardware setups, and prepping the bench for the day’s experiments.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"b12ef76cd68f\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"a94b38c913ea\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"9:00 AM: \"},{\"_key\":\"56748d3b93df\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Place a lunch order through Groq-partnered food-delivery app, then dive into the first work block of the day.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"382544c4403e\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"6cacf341bc0a\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"12:30 PM: \"},{\"_key\":\"a038f43d520d\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Lunch in the office with other interns and engineers. Occasionally, we’ll have lunches with external vendors or lunch-and-learn sessions focused on new hardware tools or design workflows.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"17877df2c515\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"e0cb6bf7ee84\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"1:00 PM: \"},{\"_key\":\"3e84f93e4707\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Continue into the next work block. Afternoons usually focus on power characterization and collaborating across teams (one of the best parts of being at Groq is the range of projects you get to touch)!\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"5f91fd37f496\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"8a1b757ebd56\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"3:30 PM: \"},{\"_key\":\"6722569b8776\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Meet with teams across silicon, firmware, and systems teams to review data and discuss next steps. Some days include vendor meetings on VRM tuning or component debugging.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"200e33bb7a96\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"57c65530eead\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"5:30 PM: \"},{\"_key\":\"fde8c59ec6dd\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Sync with my manager to go over the day’s findings and results. I’ll often stay longer to wrap up work, tidy documentation, or push a few more changes before heading out.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"},{\"_key\":\"8eabed281ef1\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"0fb3050e8aea\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[\"strong\"],\"text\":\"Optional - Post-6:00 PM: \"},{\"_key\":\"585ef75fb81c\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"On days when there’s a big push or the team’s wrapping up something exciting, a few will stick around late to finish strong and grab dinner nearby.\"}],\"level\":1,\"listItem\":\"bullet\",\"markDefs\":[],\"style\":\"normal\"}],\"title\":\"Hardware Engineering Intern\"}],\"layoutVariant\":\"full\",\"theme\":{\"label\":\"light-200\",\"value\":\"#F3F3EE\"},\"title\":\"Intern Day in the Life\"},{\"_key\":\"8b289ad3579a\",\"_type\":\"featuredNews\",\"body\":[{\"_key\":\"c62a3e3332ed\",\"_type\":\"block\",\"children\":[{\"_key\":\"a4df5a2509d0\",\"_type\":\"span\",\"marks\":[],\"text\":\"Build fast.
